entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16.
